page.title: 05AMENITIES
page.content: In the Bont Newydd area there are very few amenities to speak of, as most of the ground cover is farmland. Of those that are there, the there, the only amenities of any significance are the few houses and the church at Cefn. In the actual villiage of Bont-Newydd there is a public house which appears to survive on the money it takes from the small number of customers in the area. The area in question is clearly better suited to a ground cover survey rather than an amenities survey, as the farms by far out number the aminities.
